Package de.lessvoid.nifty.render

Class NiftyImageMode

java.lang.Object
de.lessvoid.nifty.render.NiftyImageMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Parameterizable, ImageMode
@Deprecated public class NiftyImageMode extends Object implements ImageMode
Deprecated.
use ImageModeFactory class instead to create ImageMode instances.
RenderImageMode supports the following modes.

- "normal" (render the given image to the given image size) - "subImage:" (render the given subImage of the image to the given size) - "resize:" (special mode that allows scaling of bitmaps with a predefined schema) - "repeat:" (special mode that repeating of texture)
